bug.author: EMCP
bug.summary: v0.10.2 - upper and lower dataset page counters not in sync
bug.description: I am scrolling a somewhat large dataset (600 images)... somehow I have the top of the page showing I am on page (2)... and if I scroll down to the bottom and hit 3.. it stays on (3). Scroll back up and see page 2 is still highlighted blue.
